title: Literacy and common sense (TEFC)
creator_credit: Open College of Further Education (S. Aust.)
brief_description: Don Holdaway demonstrates a lesson in literacy with primary school children. Discusses his teaching methods and how they can be adapted to suit most classroom situations. Author of set text “Foundations of Literacy”.
